thread.section_title: Exceptional Villas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Exceptional Villas | www.exceptionalvillas.com
thread.title: Colleen

author: Colleen
title: Colleen
text: Noreen was great. There were a few things it would have been nice to know in advance but nothing she could have known. For example average price for a meal out is $50 US per person. The grocery store is on the other side of the island so prestocking as much as possible is important for your first night and following morning. Charge for prestocking fridge was 20% not $25.
